item.title: The Real Value of the VCDX Certification
item.author: yourname@example.com (Christian Mohn)
item.description: The VMware Certified Design Expert: VCDX. THE certification of certifications, especially if you work with VMware based solutions. It’s often regarded as the holy grail of certifications, and rightfully so. But why is this the case, and why does «everyone» want to become one? The reasons for it being such a highly coveted title, are pretty obvious: Very few people can call themselves VCDX, at the time of writing only 186 people have successfully defended their design.
